result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing the client and data structures necessary for verifying turnstile challenges.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client logic and data models related to turnstile verification.

internal/infras/turnstile/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for verifying turnstile challenges.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information due to redacted fields.
Error handling may not cover all edge cases.

internal/infras/turnstile/models.go.purpose: Defines types and structures for handling turnstile verification requests and responses.
